atributes.sql:
SELECT 'ALL','All Websites' FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT store_id,code FROM @core_store

title: Sales General
report_sql:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at,'%b %e,%Y') AS `Period`,
             COUNT(A.entity_id) as `Number of Orders`,
             ROUND(SUM(A.total_qty_ordered),0) AS `Items Ordered`,
             ROUND(SUM(A.base_grand_total*A.base_to_global_rate),2) AS `Subtotal`,
             ROUND(SUM(A.base_tax_amount*A.base_to_global_rate),2) AS `Tax`,
             ROUND(SUM(A.shipping_amount*A.base_to_global_rate),2) AS `Shipping`,
             ROUND(SUM(A.discount_amount*A.base_to_global_rate),2) AS `Discount`,
             ROUND(SUM((A.base_grand_total+A.base_tax_amount+A.shipping_amount+A.discount_amount)*A.base_to_global_rate),2) AS `Total`,
             A.global_currency_code as `Currency`
FROM @sales_flat_order  A
 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN :STARTDATE AND :ENDDATE
   AND (':STORE_ID'='ALL' OR A.store_id=':STORE_ID')
   AND status='complete'
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at,'%b %e,%Y')
ORDER BY A.created_at

atributes.reportDescription: Sales Information (number of requests, number of products, subtotal, taxes, transportation costs, discounts and total) grouped by day.
